CVE-2022-28948 ### Vulnerable Library - github.com/go-yaml/yaml-496545a6307b2a7d7a710fd516e5e16e8ab62dbc

YAML support for the Go language.

Dependency Hierarchy: - github.com/stretchr/testify-v1.7.0 (Root Library) - :x: **github.com/go-yaml/yaml-496545a6307b2a7d7a710fd516e5e16e8ab62dbc** (Vulnerable Library)

Found in HEAD commit: 3a2b86ebed54b2f01acfa03635867e89913c3bd4

Found in base branch: master

### Vulnerability Details

An issue in the Unmarshal function in Go-Yaml v3 causes the program to crash when attempting to deserialize invalid input.

Publish Date: 2022-05-19

URL: CVE-2022-28948
